name: Stellar Companions
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
After logging into the game during the event period, Trailblazers can obtain Golden Companion Spirits as rewards through the Travel Log. Golden Companion Spirit has no time limit and will not expire after the event ends. It can be used to exchange for a 5-star character at the Stellar Convergence shop.

◆ Exchange Shop ◆
● The Stellar Convergence shop is always open, and characters that have been added to the shop will be permanently exchangeable.
● Characters in the shop can be exchanged until their Eidolon level is maxed. When their Eidolon level is maxed, they cannot be exchanged.
※ The shop will expand its catalog of exchangeable characters in the future.
